ModMetaData.name: [O21] Virtual Sexuality
ModMetaData.author: Neronix17
ModMetaData.description: Lightweight sexuality overhaul for RimWorld. - Sexuality is a new section of the Bio using a new separate system instead of traits. - Vanilla has men wanting younger women, and women wanting older men, pawns will now just be more likely to go for someone their own age. - Pawns should now be much less likely to flirt with those who are never going to be interested.
